sentence.Network_en: Having seen Li Surung's embarassed face, Delun Fujin laughed complacently in dark!
sentence.Network_cn: 看到李萨灵尴尬的脸, 德伦福晋暗地里满意地笑!

sentence.Network_en: He accidentally fell and was embarassed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不小心摔倒在地上,脸上露出窘相.

auth_sentence.content: So I thought, this is a bit of a punt but if it goes horribly wrong I will be embarassed but I won't be on the street.
